context: To get going all you need to do is type
QandA.question: /ask [what you wish you knew]

context: So %s the idea is to ask a question you wish you had the answer to
or - `why do I have several lows in a row`
or - `what is the meaning of life` :)
Then we will check in with you and see if they are still important questions to you!
Remember get going all you need to do is type
QandA.question: /ask [what you wish you knew]
